TopicTitle: Ask a stupid question, Get a stupid answer back.

Articles.Content:
Yes and no, he is in a quantum posistion

Does rockets exist in ksp?

Edited December 27, 2022 by ffx
hey new page

No. The only thing that exists in KSP is untitled craft

Is that Quantum Jeb?

No that is Quantum Cola. Now you can bake a pie.

If I am inside the Galaxy then how do I know what it looks like?

Simple. Grab a hammer and hit your head with it. Now you can see the Galaxy. 

How to bake Nuka-Cola pie?

Collect three supermutant arms, twenty two mirelurk shells, ten deathclaw death claws, fifteen vampire tongues from Arefu, boil it in a radioactive geyser.
While doing that, you will suddenly find an old fridge with a recipe inside.

Why is the Mothership Zeta  furniture so perfect?

No dirty wastelanders to mess it up.

Did you follow a caravan on your first playthrough and completely miss Megaton?

(I did)

Never heard of that. 

Can jeb fly to the ISS without starliner? 

Edited January 2, 2023 by Abel Military Services

Starliner isn't stock. Jeb doesn't need it.

7 hours ago, ColdJ said:

Did you follow a caravan on your first playthrough and completely miss Megaton?

No.
I took this game rather seriously, like the best of them (Duke Nukem 3d, Heretic/Hexen, Half-Life 1, etc.), so was living in it rather than just playing, and had my pants wet from fear after  crawling in the night through the rather specific and dangerous game world, when I had reached the Megaton gate.

Why did they use that  annoying greenish-blue color filter in Fallout 3?

Because it's made of asbestos. 

Why Everyone likes hypergolic fuels?

Because this forum is a Hypergolics Anonymous club.

Why do the magic schools look like a British high-society high school?

Because there hasn't been a new one in 200 years.

Does being rich actually make you happy?

I'm rich with ideas but still want moar.

What are the "eleven" and "twelve" Roman digits?

Both of them are single, so have fun!

Does anyone have advice on breathing in Eve's atmosphere?

Yeah.  Don't. 

Any advice on how to hold your breath?

Edited January 17, 2023 by Scarecrow71

You can hang your neck on something high. 

Any advice on RBMK reactor design?

Put colored LEDs on it to help the future movie makers.

How to help Queen Gedren defeat that stupid Sonja and her dude?

First, prepare at least 90 tons of weapons grade fissile material, then compress it using dynamite when you want a big explosion and death amount of radiation. 

How to make an atomic bomb without been noticed by IAEA?

Make a monoatomic bomb consisting of one atom of uranium.

Are there seals on Sedna?

Maybe, but I know for sure there are Bulgarians orbiting Betelgeuse, and Montenegrins on Mars.

Can polen into space?

Edited January 18, 2023 by Ben J. Kerman

If you add boosters. 

Can I infiltrate IAEA to get uranium hexafloride? 

Edited January 18, 2023 by Abel Military Services

Call the Hexamiami information service to get more info about Hexafloride.

Why is Windows so much better than Linux?

Because Macrosoft Rulez!

Why everyone likes Plutonium?

Because it's hot.

What if make a hammer out of Thorium?

You just overpaid for materials by a factor of about 2,000, for a hammer that likely will not function correctly.

What if I make a hammer out of bacon grease?

Thor will be mad. 

What if I make a hammer out of Schrabidium?
